channel.title: Comand list
channel.description:
Here are the comands i have come up with so far for hybridscape, im hoping it will cut down on noob posts. (for all you noobs who dont read stickys)
::pickup (id) (amount) for instance, ::pickup 1039 10 will put 10 red phats into your inv. ::emote (emot number) ::tele (coordx) (coordy) ::bank ::setobject (to) (from) ::setitem (to) (from) ::npc (npc id) .....this code spawns npc's ::pnpc (npc id)..... turns you into pretty much anything you want
These are all the fist timers and noobs comands
NOTE (ALL ITEM ID'S CAN BE ACCESED BY GOING TO THE HELP MENU THEN ITEM ID'S, SAME WITH NPC ID's!!!)

item.title: Comand list
item.dc:creator: @gamesTotheLIMIT gamesTotheLIMIT
item.description:
@gamesTotheLIMIT wrote:

Here are the comands i have come up with so far for hybridscape, im hoping it will cut down on noob posts. (for all you noobs who dont read stickys)

::pickup (id) (amount) for instance, ::pickup 1039 10 will put 10 red phats into your inv.
::emote (emot number)
::tele (coordx) (coordy)
::bank
::setobject (to) (from)
::setitem (to) (from)
::npc (npc id) …this code spawns npc’s
::pnpc (npc id)… turns you into pretty much anything you want

These are all the fist timers and noobs comands

NOTE (ALL ITEM ID’S CAN BE ACCESED BY GOING TO THE HELP MENU THEN ITEM ID’S, SAME WITH NPC ID’s!!!)

Read full topic
